result.title: Caves
result.content:
Hi,

How would I solve problem Caves from Codeforces Season 2 Training #7?

Right now, I cannot think of any good algorithm to solve this problem. I've tried decomposing the number of nodes, n, into its factors (in O(sqrt(n)) time), and then using dp on the factors, but this algorithm doesn't work due to the strict TL. Are there any other ideas on this problem?

See here for the problems.

Thanks in advance, sdf89013
